channel.title: I'm snoopy
channel.description:
Everybody already knew and I can't keep bother talking about my self as a third person..
For the virus part I quit it long time ago and never harmed anyone except the one who ran st-rk-pk.info because you hacked my vps and stole the source before..
So I will stop talking about myself in third person and if I get banned its fine with me because there's mainly jerks out here who cares more about people grammar then anything else.

item.title: I'm snoopy
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

^ Exactly, it’s not important.

But anyway, this guy was banned so I’m just going to lock the thread.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm snoopy
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:37, topic:409083”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=510367.msg3710577#msg3710577 date=1313331887]

“Still insulting people.” (multiple offenses)

It’s up to the mod that gave the infraction if they want to explain themselves more, I’m not allowed to tell you who it was (but I can tell you it wasn’t me)

If we list 2-3 moderators we suspect, will you be able to let us know if the moderator is in that list?
[/quote]that would be telling.[/quote]
Not really, seeing we worked it out ourselves, and it isn’t saying which mod it is or isn’t… If the mod is in the list, there is a good chance that it wasn’t the specific mod you’re thinking, but if they’re not in the list there are quite a few mods that could have done it.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm snoopy
item.dc:creator: @putaz putaz
item.description:
@putaz wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:4, topic:409085”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=510367.msg3704672#msg3704672 date=1312949714]Can you link me to each any every one of your other accounts?[/quote]Search for related IP’s on the below accounts and you will find a lot more too.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

He openly admits to spreading malicious code via client distribution on at least 3 of his many failed private servers. For example, in the below thread he brags about releasing a virus in his client and infecting 20 RSC players: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,460399.msg3368992.html[/quote]

Wow get a life? thought he asked me…

marcelius19 is not my account. But otherwise its correct… jaghetermario is also one of my account… I did not make these account for spreading virus… The retard kryptix just assume because hes idiot.

My apologies but it’s easy to *** ***t while hearing shit from people who don’t know me and talk about my grammar… I helped alot of people in my days and a few people apologies what I do. [If I do something]

Read full topic

item.title: I'm snoopy
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:15, topic:409083"][quote author=Ix Andrew link=topic=510367.msg3704802#msg3704802 date=1312955991]

Isn’t this like the 8th time you’ve made a new name because everyone hates you yet get found out within minutes only to deny it for a few weeks and then come clean anyway?
[/quote]Hey, is it true that about 320 people hate you?

I’d sooner 320 people hate me than no one knowing who I am.

YOU KILLED RSCANGEL, GO FUCK YOURSELF. PRICK.

Im pretty sure RSCA died by itself…It had less than 10 players for months.[/quote]
RSCE and RSCA were gonna merge. RSCE started transferring account stats/items. After awhile I think Kryptix said he didn’t want to merge anymore, simply because he already took RSCA’s entire userbase.

Read full topic
